dos_Number of DataSets in Service: Number of Data Sets in Service
dos_Number of IndicatorGroups in Service: Number of Indicator Groups in Service
dos_NumberElementsSection: Number of Data Elements in Section
dos_TrackedEntityAttributesNumber: Number of Tracked Entity Attributes in Program
dos_ProgramRuleVariableAssign: Program Rule Variable to Assign to
dos_ProgramRuleVariablesNumber: Number of Rule Variables in Program
dos_Number of Indicators in Group: Number of Indicators in Indicator Group
srch_SelectColumns_grpBasics: Data Elements or Indicators Groups - Basics
object_type_help: Defines the data type of the specific data element  or indicator used in the form.
object_name_help: Defines the name of the data element or indicator assigned/used in a dataset.
object_form_help: Defines the form name in the section form.(Applicable to Data Elements only).
object_id_help: Defines the unique ID of the data element or indicator used in the form.
object_code_help: Defines the unique code assigned to the data element or indicator in the form.
object_ICD10_help: Defines the unique ICD10 Code assigned to the specified data element or indicator in the form.
object_description_help: Defines the description of the Data Element or Indicator used in a form.
object_num_formula_help: Defines a description of the numerator formula used in an Indicator. Applicable for Indicators.
object_den_formula_help: Defines a description of the denominator formula used in an Indicator. Applicable for Indicators.
objectGroup_name_help: Defines the name of the data element or indicator groups assigned or used in a dataset.
objectGroup_id_help: Defines the unique ID of the data element or indicator group used in a dataset.
objectGroup_code_help: Defines the unique code assigned to the data element or indicator group used in a dataset.
service_name_help: Defines the name of the Service assigned to the dataset.
service_id_help: Defines the unique service ID of the data element or indicator used in a dataset.
service_code_help: Defines the unique service code assigned to the data element or indicator group used in a dataset.
srch_Help_Text:
This interface is made to simplify user access the terminology associated with information collected with HMIS.

  • Via the Search tab, you can directly search for a term in all the columns of the table. You can display column filters as well, which allow you to search for information in one specific column. Use 'Clear filters' to reset all the filters. Expert users can use the key word '|' (OR) to search multiple objects.
  • Via the Select Columns tab, you can select columns to be displayed in the table. Expert users can use the advanced columns to perform detailed researches via IDs.
You can finally export the results of your search to Excel (page by page, and do not forget to save as .xls).
invalid_user_group: All UID's must be a valid userGroup
